data.text: This is our second visit and couldn't be happier. Hotel offers endless entertainment for kids and plenty of options for parents to chill. Facilities are the best than any other family hotel in dubai within this price range. My favourite breakfast spot is Sands Beach Club where you feel welcome and looked after from the second you are entering. My coffee arrives within 2 minutes if not less. Thank you knun Ton and the team. I also recommend water Gymnastics with Artem who makes it so much fun that my kids can't wait till next time he is at the pool side. We look forward to our next visit to wonderful Centara.
data.title: Family bliss

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Maryana A,
Warmest Greetings from Centara Mirage Beach Resort Dubai
We appreciate the time you spent to rate a perfect 100% on this web page. We aim to deliver exceptional service and a distinctive Thai-inspired experience to our valued guests. We value your interactions with our family-friendly accommodation, clean surroundings, all-aqua facilities, breathtaking views, a variety of family-friendly activities, and attentive, cooperative staff. 
We appreciate your compliments ''This is our second visit and couldn't be happier. Hotel offers endless entertainment for kids and plenty of options for parents to chill.Thank you knun Ton and the team. I also recommend water Gymnastics with Artem who makes it so much fun that my kids can't wait till next time he is at the pool side. We look forward to our next visit to wonderful Centara.'' on our facilities & services for the most beautiful holiday experiences. It's always energizing to get positive feedback and wonderful comments, especially from one of our valued guests. We would especially like to thank Khun Tom and his team with Artem from recreation for their exceptional efforts in making your stay unforgettable. 
We sincerely appreciate the trust you have in us. I want to make the most of this opportunity to thank you for staying with us. We hope to have you and your family visit us once more soon.
With Kind regards, 
Vikas Bhatia, 
Quality Manager
owner_response.author: Kanokwan Chamchoy

data.text: This hotel is perfect for families. The staff are friendly and everywhere was spotless. Big thank you to the staff who cleaned the rooms on floor 5. Also they were very helpful booking taxis for us to travel to the waterpark and the mariner.  We were a family of three generations and it suited all of us. Would definitely book there again.
data.title: Great family hotel

data.text:
Aniket did a great job.

The overall service of hotel was great!

The environment was very kid friendly and resturant food was good.

Breakfast was good and lunch and dinner was very diverse.

Pool area is very safe and night show is full of fun for kids.
data.title: Great service

data.text:
Perfect  service with Didar who is very respectful , nice hotel , and nice food.

Nothing more to wishes for  

Not to far from the  city of dubai and made on a new island .

 Great place to be  on holiday withe the familie    .

Like i said if you wanna try-out dubai 
Go to mirage centara
